CustomField.formula: NOT(Role_Not_Needed__c) && WorkType_Name__c <> "Stray" && ISPICKVAL(Status, "New") && ( ( WorkType_Name__c = "Break" && DueDate - (Duration / 1440) > NOW() + 1 && DueDate - (Duration / 1440) < NOW() + 2 ) || ( WorkType_Category__c = "Duty" && DueDate - (Duration / 1440) > NOW() + 1 && DueDate - (Duration / 1440) < NOW() + 2 ) || ( WorkType_Group__c = "Lead" && DueDate - (Duration / 1440) > NOW() + (1/24) && DueDate - (Duration / 1440) < NOW() + 2 ) || ( Is_CallRole__c && WorkType_Group__c = "Skill" && DueDate - (Duration / 1440) > NOW() + (1/24) && DueDate - (Duration / 1440) < NOW() + 2 ) || ( Is_CallRole__c && Is_AL__c = True && DueDate - (Duration / 1440) > NOW() + (1/24) && DueDate - (Duration / 1440) < NOW() + 2 ) )
CustomField.label: OPT - Q1
